text_block_list.text:
After Gentildonna's run, there was 
something unbelievable left in the turf.

Where Gentildonna ran, there was a long line of 
"holes" that could barely be called footprints.

Even compared to other Uma Musume, it was clear her 
power was an order of magnitude stronger. Just how much 
power does it take to gouge the ground like this……?

text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Gentil! You have the potential to become a Triple 
Crown Uma Musume!! Out of tens of thousands of Uma 
Musume, you can be the 7th to obtain that glory!

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: 7th, huh……would that be enough to be called the strongest?

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Haha, so the Triple Crown isn't enough?……then how about 
the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』? The greatest honor 
for the strong. Win and it would be a first for Japan.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: …………Ho ho ho.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
I'm grateful for the warm invitations. However, how 
about getting a better look at your partner's complexion?

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: ……Besides, for me――

……It had been a few days since that race. Judging by 
the rumors, Gentildonna didn't have a trainer yet.
choice_data_list: Even my senpais had been rejected……

text_block_list.text:
I'd only heard about it but, it seems like even 
veterans were being ignored. ……then she probably 
wouldn't even bother listening to a rookie.
……Hmm. What about my running?

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Please, continue.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Rather than be surprised, isn't there something you should be 
doing instead? Won't you tell me your thoughts without hesitation?

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Everything.
……while feeling pressured by her, I couldn't help but keep talking.

――what caught my attention was that "sound". 
After that, I found those "holes" in the ground.

Those holes in the ground were noticeably deeper 
than those of Verxina, the one who ran with her. And――

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: …………Too much?

Her ears perked up. 
Maybe I……just soured her mood?

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: ……And?

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
And? Is it wrong to use more power? 
Isn't it something necessary for us when racing?

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
For example, when the turf is wet. Without 
power, your feet could slip and result in a 
loss. In that situation, power is advantageous.

But, Gentildonna's power was well above average. 
The soft soil would warp and start to wrap around her feet.

The more strength she used, the deeper 
her feet would sink in to the ground.

It would be better to be able to control how strong 
she was kicking off the ground. There was a way 
to train for that. For example, her knees――

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Should I focus on my knees? 
That may affect my usual form though.
choice_data_list: ……! R-right! But I think it'll be effective!

text_block_list.text:
To begin with, Gentildonna's running style 
was a powerful style that relied on her muscles. 
It didn't take full advantage of gravity.
choice_data_list: It'd be better to fix it before debuting

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
…………I see. 
Would there be anything else to add to the menu?

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
――Is that everything? 
Well then, I'll excuse myself here.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: ――……but before that.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
By the next time we speak, fix that habit of your 
eyes wandering while we talk. Just like that 
umblemished badge, it screams "I'm new at this".

Unblemished badge…… 
I traced my finger over the badge attached to my lapel.

It seemed like she had known that I was a 『Rookie 
Trainer』. But, even though she knew that, she continued 
speaking with me for the sake of "strength", and――

text_block_list.name: Gentil & Buena
text_block_list.text:
Haaaaaaaaaaaaaa! 
Yaaaaaaaaaaaaa!

text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I can't believe it……just now, that girl running 
with Gentildonna is Buena Vista, isn't it!?

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I know. Even then, compared to before, 
Gentildonna's running has gotten more――

Gentildonna's running style was starting to change. Even 
though that conversation had occurred only a little 
while ago――she was already running based on what I said.

text_block_list.name: Buena Vista
text_block_list.text: Fuu～……good work out there, Gentil-san! Ummm――

text_block_list.name: Buena Vista
text_block_list.text:
One more, right!? Until that run from 
earlier is ingrained in to your body.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Yes. You have time, don't you?

text_block_list.name: Buena Vista
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! When we're in trouble, we help 
each other. We're roommates after all――

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: ――Gentildonna!

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Ara, Verxina-san. 
What's the matter?

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: ――I challenge you to a race.
